Even though they have known each other for 30 years, they became enemies since the first day in law school. During their first court case after graduation, SIU-YUE suspects that LIK-WANG has won the case by playing tricks and they hate each other even more. SIU-YUE meets the TV anchor MOK HEI-LOI (Grace Wong) after losing his love. They get married swiftly but they separate after a few months. HEI-LOI meets LIK-WANG by chance and they get along really well. The love triangle has further worsened the relationship between SIU-YUE and LIK-WANG. programme.title: Clash Of Home Chefs
programme.desc: Home-cooked meals may seem ordinary on the surface, but in reality, they require careful planning, a balance suitable for all ages, and a focus on health and flavorâ€”all thanks to the culinary skills of the family's chef. Fourteen contestants each presented their unique recipes, facing hosts Nancy Sit, Archie Sin, Tiffany Fabienne Kwan, and Nicholas Yuen, as well as judge "Third Sister" Kitty Siu, star guests and their families for tasting and evaluation. The fourteen participants were divided into seven teams to compete in the kitchen, battling it out with designated ingredients and two signature dishes of their choice. The seven winning teams advanced directly, while among the losing teams, the contestant with the most "Delicious Star Badges" could also move forward. Afterwards, the eight remaining contestants were split into groups of four for head-to-head competition, with the top scorer from each groupâ€”making a total of twoâ€”entering the ultimate showdown to vie for the title of "Champion Chef."

He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager. When he meets his parents again, he denies them three times. He even returns his flesh to his father and bones to his mother. Although he is resurrected again, he becomes a 'Vegetable'. Arrogant NAR JAR turns into a dummy. Meanwhile, Shang Dynasty emperor ZHOU (CHENG TSE SHING, TIMOTHY) abandons his empire for his mistress TANGIE (WAN PIK HAR, IRENE) and puts the empire in jeopardy. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development. He, KEUNG and HUI MAN BILL (Chan Kam Hung, Sunny) organized a development company and earned their first bucket of gold. When TIM was happy with his achievement, his enemy had broken his brother's legs. TIM suffered a great blow and decided to reform. programme.title: Roadside Station Guide XIII
programme.desc: Japan has over a thousand â€œMichi-no-Ekiâ€� (roadside stations), providing drivers with convenient rest stops along their journeys. These stations are also gateways for exploring the unique characteristics of nearby areas, offering opportunities to discover local specialties, cuisine, and cultural surprises. Wong Yau-nam and Leung Wan-yu set out on a self-driving tour, visiting thirteen distinctive Michi-no-Eki in the Kanto region and traveling along the â€œRomantic Roadâ€� that connects places like Tochigi and Gunma Prefectures, embarking on a new kind of travel experience. After stopping at a rest area known as a hidden â€œdessert paradise,â€� they ventured into orchards to pick and eat seasonal fruits on the spot, and sampled photogenic wagashi (Japanese confections) and fruit-flavored shaved ice. They also explored a rest stop featuring a collection of Mashiko pottery, enjoyed the ambiance of a Mashiko ware teahouse, and visited a sake brewery to savor local sake.

programme.title: The Defected
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects. Chief Superintendent Wan Hei-wah, ambitious and poised to become the force's first "Top Lady," is shot and wounded by none other than Hei-wah's undercover agent, Yau Ping-ko. Bing-ko, driven by his unwavering resolve, is surprised when Hei-wah breaks his promise. In a fit of rage, Bing-ko accidentally injures Sheung-bang, a move filled with remorse and a secretive effort to help Sheung-bang solve the case as compensation. A power struggle turns Sheung-bang and Bing-ko into pawns, but thanks to the help of Chief Superintendent Cheng Yu-sum, he vows to put an end to the power struggle!

programme.title: Christian's Choice
programme.desc: Hong Kong's culinary industry has been buffeted by the pandemic, economic downturn, and a surge in consumer spending in mainland China, putting its precious culinary culture at risk. Some restaurants remain steadfast, honing their craft day after day, adapting to changing circumstances. They're sharing these challenging times with their customers through exceptional culinary skills and delicious cuisine, a journey that brings growth to the community. Adhering to the principles of authentic, independently owned restaurants with a long history, host Christian Yang curates a selection of "Friends" restaurants, exploring the hidden, heartwarming stories behind these establishments, tasting their extraordinary signature dishes, and appreciating the fighting spirit of Hong Kong's culinary culture.

Jika itu Zeyra. Maka, Aman Zarul yang akan berurusan dengan Qeena adalah Aman Zarul yang Qeena kenal. Qeena tidak mahu dan tidak sanggup bertemu dengan Aman. programme.title: The Defected
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects. Chief Superintendent Wan Hei-wah, ambitious and poised to become the force's first "Top Lady," is shot and wounded by none other than Hei-wah's undercover agent, Yau Ping-ko. Bing-ko, driven by his unwavering resolve, is surprised when Hei-wah breaks his promise. In a fit of rage, Bing-ko accidentally injures Sheung-bang, a move filled with remorse and a secretive effort to help Sheung-bang solve the case as compensation. A power struggle turns Sheung-bang and Bing-ko into pawns, but thanks to the help of Chief Superintendent Cheng Yu-sum, he vows to put an end to the power struggle!

programme.desc: Home-cooked meals may seem ordinary on the surface, but in reality, they require careful planning, a balance suitable for all ages, and a focus on health and flavorâ€”all thanks to the culinary skills of the family's chef. Fourteen contestants each presented their unique recipes, facing hosts Nancy Sit, Archie Sin, Tiffany Fabienne Kwan, and Nicholas Yuen, as well as judge "Third Sister" Kitty Siu, star guests and their families for tasting and evaluation. The fourteen participants were divided into seven teams to compete in the kitchen, battling it out with designated ingredients and two signature dishes of their choice. The seven winning teams advanced directly, while among the losing teams, the contestant with the most "Delicious Star Badges" could also move forward. Afterwards, the eight remaining contestants were split into groups of four for head-to-head competition, with the top scorer from each groupâ€”making a total of twoâ€”entering the ultimate showdown to vie for the title of "Champion Chef."

Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu. But he realizes Sheung Siu has hooked up with lawyer Tai Ching-kwan (Joe Ma) and gang boss Tai Ching-yan (Pierre Ngo). He also finds out his colleague and also buddy Chun Wing-hei (Mat Yeung) used to go out with Sheung Siu. The duo keep a close watch on the Tai brothers as they want to get her back on the straight and narrow. Au Yeung Chung and Ching-kwan have different values. programme.title: Star Trail
programme.desc: Successfully performing at the Hong Kong Coliseum, the pinnacle of the Hong Kong music scene, is no small feat. To break out of Hong Kong and embark on a world tour requires unimaginable blood, sweat, and tears! Host Lai Chi-shan's new interview program, "Star Trail," takes advantage of the tours of Wynners, Grasshopper, Hins Cheung, Jackson Wang, Miriam Yeung, Kelly Chen, and Andy Hui in China, the United States, and Malaysia to offer a glimpse into the stage presence of these stars and reveal their lesser-known off-stage personalities. programme.title: The Defected
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects. Chief Superintendent Wan Hei-wah, ambitious and poised to become the force's first "Top Lady," is shot and wounded by none other than Hei-wah's undercover agent, Yau Ping-ko. Bing-ko, driven by his unwavering resolve, is surprised when Hei-wah breaks his promise. In a fit of rage, Bing-ko accidentally injures Sheung-bang, a move filled with remorse and a secretive effort to help Sheung-bang solve the case as compensation. A power struggle turns Sheung-bang and Bing-ko into pawns, but thanks to the help of Chief Superintendent Cheng Yu-sum, he vows to put an end to the power struggle!

programme.title: Knot To Treasure
programme.desc: Wei (Zhu Jiang), the eldest son of Wei (Chen Jiewen), is wild and untamed. Under family pressure, he finally marries Shan (Zhang Fengni), with whom he has been dating for many years. After their marriage, Yat-sen develops an extramarital affair with Yan (Cui Jiabao), eventually living with her and abandoning Shan. Later, realizing Yan's overly open attitude towards relationships, he decides to pursue Shan again. Second son Zhong (Ekin Cheng), returning from abroad, brings his close girlfriend Xi (Chan Miu-ying), shattering Mei's (Chen Songling) dream of him. Shadowed by her parents' divorce, Xi eventually breaks up with Zhong. Meanwhile, Mei regains her confidence and charm. Zhong begins to admire Mei, but Mei has already joined her good friend Hao (Louis Koo). Youngest daughter Tung (Lam Chi-kwan), a bright and clever girl, marries the promising young man Tung (Wong Kai-tak). However, under her father's strict control, she dares not reveal her relationship with Tung. Can each of them fulfill their dreams and find a good home?
